column2: Staff of Shango
The staff of the deified king, Shango. It grants the wielder prestige and authority, but it comes with the expectation of peace.
Mask of Ekwensu
The mask of the trickster, Ekwensu. While not evil in and of itself, enemies of those who hold it seem to disappear...
Sacred Amber Crown
A beautiful crown with a polished amber gem set in it. It is a symbol of the great wealth of amber harvested from the baltic.
Yadachy Cloak
The cloak of a great Yadachy. It is a symbol of piety and authority.
Pestle and mortar of Baba Yaga
The mortar and pestle of Baba Yaga. While it is a symbol of great power, they are considered to be wholly evil and corrupting.
Firebird's Plumage
The plumage of a great firebird. It is said to bring great fortune to it's holder.
Dragon Scale
The scale of a great mountain dragon. To hold one is to hold great power and strike fear into your enemies.
Ukonvasara
The hammer of Ukko. It inspires soldiers, and demoralize opponents.
Väinämöinen's Kantele
The first Kantele, crafted by the mage Väinämöinen. It is believed to have magical properties.
Eye of Ra
The eye of the egyptian sun god, Ra. Ra is known for his benevolence and fertility.
Chariot of Helios
The golden chariot driven across the sky by Helios, the sun titan.
